summary: Established in 2001, and today with subscribers in more than 64 foreign countries, Hollywood Weekly's (HW) focus on diversity sets the benchmark for entertainment magazines. Brands seeking to improve the return on their advertising investment will benefit from HW's creation of a digital catalogue which features an extensive library of nearly 100 past issue, providing ongoing exposure for clients who previously placed ads. By focusing on advertorials, HW has become a respected marketing tool for trendy luxury brands, professionals, artist and new talent who incorporate their access to Facebook, Twitter and other social media to effectively extend the reach of HW, connecting our articles with their network. Once published, our advertorials are indexed in Google Search Engine which has enabled Hollywood Weekly Magazine to trend worldwide!  Today, HW has an online footprint in 8 of the top 10 US cities. Digital editions of HW are downloaded daily in more than 40 top-tier 5-star European hotels. Advertisers are able to attract affluent consumers from Hong Kong to Munich and beyond, by simply placing an ad! To inquire about advertising, please send an email to: HollywoodPublisher@gmail.comThanks!Prather JacksonPublisher
